comments: Tests ensuring ROWPARTITON and ROWOFFSET work as user column names before KLIP-50 is integrated

tests.name: create ROWOFFSET and ROWPARTITION user columns as STRINGs
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (id int KEY, val STRING, other_val STRING) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT id, val as ROWPARTITION, other_val as ROWOFFSET FROM INPUT;

sources.name: OUTPUT
sources.schema: ID INT KEY, ROWPARTITION STRING, ROWOFFSET STRING

tests.name: test ROWOFFSET and ROWPARTITION user columns with data types the pseudocolumns will later represent
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (id int KEY, val INTEGER, other_val BIGINT) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT id, val as ROWPARTITION, other_val as ROWOFFSET FROM INPUT;

sources.name: OUTPUT
sources.schema: ID INT KEY, ROWPARTITION INTEGER, ROWOFFSET BIGINT
